sentences.chinese: 其所以統之者非其道故也。
sentences.literal: Their way of controlling them not its way therefore.

sentences.chinese: 紂剖比干，囚箕子，為炮格，刑殺無辜，時臣下懔然，莫必其命。
sentences.literal: Zhou cut open Bi Gan, imprisoned Ji Zi, made pao ge, punished killed innocent, time ministers below fearful, none certain their fate.

sentences.chinese: 然而周師至，而令不行乎下，不能用其民。
sentences.literal: However Zhou armies arrived, yet commands not proceed below, cannot use their people.
This how commands not strict, punishments not numerous?

sentences.chinese: 其所以統之者非其道故也。
sentences.literal: Their way of controlling them not its way therefore.

sentences.chinese: 古者之兵，戈矛弓矢而已，然而敵國不待試而詘。
sentences.literal: Ancient ones' weapons, dagger-axes spears bows arrows only, however enemy states not wait test and submit.

sentences.chinese: 城郭不集，溝池不掘，固塞不樹，機變不張，然而國晏然不畏外而固者，無他故焉，明道而均分之，時使而誠愛之，則下應之如景響。
sentences.literal: Walls cities not gathered, moats pools not dug, solid barriers not planted, stratagems changes not displayed, however state peaceful not fear external secure, no other reason, clarify way evenly distribute them, timely employ sincerely love them, then below respond like shadow echo.

sentences.chinese: 有不由命者，然後俟之以刑，則民知罪矣。
sentences.literal: Have not follow commands, then wait with punishments, then people know crime.
Therefore punish one person and realm submits.

sentences.chinese: 罪人不尤其上，知罪之在己也。
sentences.literal: Criminal people not blame superiors, know crime in themselves.

sentences.chinese: 是故刑罰省而威行如流，無他故焉，由其道故也。
sentences.literal: Therefore punishments few awe flows like stream, no other reason, by its way therefore.

sentences.chinese: 故由其道則行，不由其道則廢。
sentences.literal: Therefore follow its way then proceed, not follow its way then abandon.

sentences.chinese: 古者帝堯之治天下也，蓋殺一人刑二人而天下治。
sentences.literal: Ancient Emperor Yao governed realm, probably killed one person punished two persons and realm governed.

sentences.chinese: 傳曰「威厲而不試，刑措而不用」。
sentences.literal: Tradition says "Awe severe not tested, punishments set aside not used".
